[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1449206857420{margin-bottom: 23px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449206862084{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

H1 HEADING TAG — 42px

Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449206865476{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

H2 HEADING TAG — 36px

Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1449206870266{margin-bottom: 22px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449206873621{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

H4 HEADING TAG — 24px

Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1449206884951{margin-bottom: 42px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1449206888355{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

H6 HEADING TAG — 14px

Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1446110350133{margin-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1446104722749{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Buttons” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_btn title=”Big button” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”theme_style_1″ i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”stm-arrow-next” add_icon=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1446103983499{margin-right: 17px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”small” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”theme_style_1″ size=”sm” i_align=”right” i_icon_fontawesome=”stm-arrow-next” add_icon=”true”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1446104729693{padding-top: 180px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}” el_class=”secondary_bg_color fix_paddings”][vc_btn title=”Big button” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”theme_style_2″ i_icon_fontawesome=”stm-download” add_icon=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1448609496728{margin-right: 17px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”small” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”theme_style_2″ size=”sm” i_icon_fontawesome=”stm-case” add_icon=”true”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1446104734702{padding-top: 180px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}” el_class=”base_bg_color fix_paddings”][vc_btn title=”Big button” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”theme_style_3″ css=”.vc_custom_1446104079943{margin-right: 17px !important;}”][vc_btn title=”small” style=”outline” shape=”round” color=”theme_style_3″ size=”sm”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1446110805164{margin-bottom: 52px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Full width

Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1446110920521{margin-bottom: 53px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Two Columns” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1446110980742{margin-bottom: 53px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Three Columns” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Over 42,000 dedicated employees, working in 17 regional clusters around the globe, deliver operational excellence — to provide viable answers to the most challenging supply chain questions.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Globally known for our ability to handle every last detail of our customers’ particular logistics and forwarding needs, BestLogistic’s Special Services team takes care of all your logistics.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Provides a scalable and customizable solution for customers who have programs to retire outdated IT assets. Delivering logistical services and much more to the exhibition.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1449206984363{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Four Columns” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1449206954368{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  1. Logistics Ground’s flexible model
  2. Using only quality carriers, means
  3. You benefit from improved service
  4. Levels, greater flexibility

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1449206957984{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  • Time-definite deliveries
  • Our expertise in transport
  • Management and planning allows
  • Us to design a solution that meets

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1449206961792{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  • Our non-asset based Road network
  • Provides you tour needs
  • Also quickly respond to any event
  • Disruptions, such as weather

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1449206965744{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

  • With flexibility, improved service
  • Levels, accelerated delivery
  • Reduced direct and indirect
  • Costs much less complexity

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
